description: This Kotlin source file defines the NoteDetailActivity class for an Android app, responsible for displaying the details of a note, providing options to edit or delete it, and handling user interactions within the note detail screen.

classes.name: NoteDetailActivity
classes.description: An Android activity class that displays detailed information about a note, allows editing and deletion, and manages user interactions on the note detail screen.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up the UI, loads the note based on the intent extra, and configures toolbar actions.

methods.name: confirmDelete
methods.description: Shows a confirmation dialog to delete the note; on confirmation, deletes the note via the ViewModel and finishes the activity.
